Uses of Class
org.apache.river.jeri.internal.http.HttpClientManager

  • Packages that use HttpClientManager 
    Package Description
    net.jini.jeri.http
    Provides implementations of the Endpoint and ServerEndpoint abstractions that use HTTP messages sent over TCP sockets as the underlying communication mechanism.
    net.jini.jeri.ssl
    Provides implementations of Endpoint and ServerEndpoint that use TLS/SSL and HTTPS (HTTP over TLS/SSL) to support invocation constraints.
    org.apache.river.jeri.internal.http

    • Uses of HttpClientManager in org.apache.river.jeri.internal.http

      Fields in org.apache.river.jeri.internal.http declared as HttpClientManager 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private HttpClientManager HttpClientConnection.manager 
      Constructors in org.apache.river.jeri.internal.http with parameters of type HttpClientManager 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpClientConnection(String host, int port, HttpClientSocketFactory factory, HttpClientManager manager)
      Creates HttpClientConnection which sends requests directly to given host/port through a socket obtained from the given socket factory.
      HttpClientConnection(String targetHost, int targetPort, String proxyHost, int proxyPort, boolean tunnel, boolean persist, HttpClientSocketFactory factory, HttpClientManager manager)
      Creates HttpClientConnection which sends requests to given target host/port through the indicated HTTP proxy over a socket provided by the specified socket factory.
